name.description: Full name of the individual as printed on the visiting card.

designation.description: The professional title or job role of the individual within the organization.

company.description: The name of the business, company, or organization the individual represents.

email.description: The official email address for professional communication.

phone.description: The primary contact number for business inquiries.

alternate_phone.description: An additional contact number, if available, for backup communication.

fax.description: The official fax number of the company or individual, if applicable.

website.description: The official website URL of the company or the individual's personal website.

address.description: The primary business or office address mentioned on the card.

city.description: The city in which the office or business is located.

state.description: The state or region where the office or business is registered.

pincode.description: The postal code of the business location for mailing purposes.

country.description: The country in which the business or organization operates.

logo.description: A logo image representing the company or individual’s brand identity.

linkedin.description: The LinkedIn profile URL for professional networking.

twitter.description: The Twitter profile URL for company updates or professional engagement.

facebook.description: The Facebook profile or page URL related to the business or individual.

instagram.description: The Instagram profile URL, if applicable, for branding or marketing.

qr_code.description: A QR code link for digital contact sharing or vCard download.

tagline.description: A brief tagline or slogan representing the company’s mission or values.

industry.description: The category or sector in which the business operates (e.g., IT, Healthcare, Finance).

branch_address.description: The address of a branch office, if different from the primary office location.
